name: Sauteed Spinach With Pine Nuts
keywords: olive oil, pine nuts, spinach, side dish
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Pick over the spinach leaves and remove the large stems. Wash and drain well. Remove all the moisture by placing between paper towels and patting dry.

In a large skillet over high heat, heat 1 tablespoon of the olive oil and half the spinach, half the nutmeg and half the pine nuts. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cook and toss very quickly until the spinach is just wilted. Drain. Repeat the procedure with the remaining ingredients and serve hot.
